messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. Room 1 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 11. Room 2 is connected to room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 3 is connected to room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 8. Room 4 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 15. Room 5 is connected to room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 6 is connected to room 9, room 12, and room 15. Room 7 is connected to room 10, and room 13. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 9 is connected to room 12 and room 15. Room 10 is connected to room 13. Room 11 is connected to room 14. Room 12 is connected to room 15. What is the shortest path from room 1 to room 7? Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

For example, if you enter 4,6,10,15, the answer will be 6,4,6,10,15.

The flow of execution in the question and answer section of a Regex bot is basically a regular pattern, the logic of the whole process can be written into a simple switch block.

As for how to write the corresponding answer according to the question, you can refer to the following table for a while.

At the same time, you need to be aware that in some cases, the answer returned by Regex may be too long. You can only test and verify by hand.

Then, when you get a question and want to get the answer, you can directly get the answer according to the pattern.

In order to make it easier for users to interact with the Regex bot, we also added some other functions to the Regex bot, such as query answers, random dice, birthday reminder, etc.

The above is the whole content of this article, I hope the content of this article to your study or work can bring some help, if you have any questions you can leave a message to communicate. Thank you for reading. See you next time.
